description: Try our easy to follow English Spinach & Cheese Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: English Spinach & Cheese Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line prepared tin with pastry. Spoon spinach mix into pastry base. Prepare remaining 4 sheets of pastry as before. Lay over spinach filling, trim edges and brush top of pie with remaining butter. Bake for 40-45 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Cut into squares and serve with salad.
